title: Love the communication, hate the bias.
text: Snapchat is a great app that allows you to connect with your friends and people you don‚Äôt even know. It allows you to get to know people better, share memories, and organize new ones. The thing I hate, absolutely despise about Snapchat is that the discover page is littered with clickbait and bias. Many posts have fake titles that either lead you to a post talking about someone or something that doesn‚Äôt even show in the story. Not to mention the political bias that is shown in many stories on the discover page. I‚Äôm not normally a political person and understand and relate to both sides views, but I see a lot of stories focused on these matters that isn‚Äôt helping anyone understand and only filling minds with biased information/blow out of proportion information. Regardless I love the app it‚Äôs just some of the content inside is annoying enough to not click on the app for the rest of the day.

title: Heartbroken
text: I‚Äôve had Snapchat when I was in middle school n I‚Äôm 22 now. I had my account permanently locked n then when asked n told them what happened in the situation . I waited 5 months for a response. As soon as the error happened , then tells me now they had permanently deleted it. How does it go from that to that . Especially when I tried logging in a new error msg popped up saying ‚Äúdue to repeated failed attempts or other unusual activity, your access to Snapchat is temporarily disabled.‚Äù Then asked about it n told me ‚Äú once an account has been Terminated, we are unable to reinstate it, chatters, who have had their account Terminated are also prohibited from creating new accounts‚Äù. Instead of helping or trying to solve the issue or at least let me use snap again . Nothing . All my memories are gone. High school , my grandparents , my hg who had passed, my first love/relation, my quince, my first car, my first place, etc . Everything is gone . All my time n everything down the drain.

title: The Unskippable ads feel like they‚Äôre force feeding the liquid at the bottom of a trashcan
text:
The unskippable ads really disrupt user experience and make me blacklist the products and entertainment I see because I find them so annoying- to the point where I‚Äôve unsubscribed from all the subscriptions I had and just watch that same content on Instagram or tiktok. They play after every fourth video and you can‚Äôt skip it for 6 seconds. They‚Äôre also not ‚Äúpersonalized‚Äù at all, so Snapchat is basically holding you hostage for seven seconds and force feeding me the liquid at the bottom of a trashcan thinking it will make me buy the company‚Äôs bottled garbage water when I have absolutely no interest whatsoever, and am now even more likely to avoid the product. 
Everything else on the app is stellar and I wouldn‚Äôt change a thing but the advertising really shows how Snapchat would rather tank their user experience just for a quick buck.

title: Ruined a good thing
text:
Snap has been the only social media app I have kept for years, but it has become the antithesis of user-friendly. You can‚Äôt delete the AI bot, which is annoying. There are constantly ads popping up in your feed‚Äî GO AWAY!! You made two whole sections of the app for sponsored content, keep the GD ads over there! And the sponsored content‚Äî it just works so poorly. You can‚Äôt search an article, so you can‚Äôt find what you want to see. You have to scroll and scroll and scroll and just hope it pops up. If you‚Äôre like me and you put time limits on all your apps, if you reach your limit the whole app freezes when you try to bypass the limit, and you lose whatever it was you were doing.
This is a billion dollar industry. Maybe use a couple dollars of those outrageous profits to make a good product? Honestly, tech CEOs are so dumb. Exploitation of the proletariat is the only way these idiots make money.

title: Someone Hacked the AI Feature?
text:
Just had the creepiest experience with the AI. It posted on its story some really weird video of what looked like a sand dune. I asked it ‚Äúwhy did you post on your story‚Äù to no response (this never happens, the bot is always supposed to respond). Then I say ‚Äúare you broken‚Äù and it responds immediately with ‚Äúno, why do you think I‚Äôm broken‚Äù and then I reply ‚Äúwhy did you post on your story?‚Äù. The bitmoji stays in the chat for 10 seconds and then leaves. Again never supposed to happen. I then screenshot the chat because I am creeped out thinking that someone could have hacked this feature possibly exposing my personal location or bank account information. About 30 seconds after I screenshot- the bot starts typing. It is typing for a long time and then suddenly disappears and never sends the message. 

I am beyond creeped out that someone has hacked into this already creepy feature and could be ransacking the personal data stored on my phone. App is deleted.

title: Great for messaging, garbage content
text: I‚Äôve used Snapchat for a very long time and the messaging works great. They also have cool filters and image editing options that are very good. The reason my review is bad is because of the absolutely brain rotting garbage that they have as shorts. When you are trying to watch content, there are ads like every 20‚Äì30 seconds. Often these ads cut off joke punch lines or cut words in half while people talk. I think this advertising method also leads to the problem of terrible click bait. You can click on a video that says one thing, but you have to skip through like 5 min worth of ads before actually seeing what was in the thumbnail if at all. Overall it‚Äôs just a disgusting content platform and I can feel my brain cells dying when I try to watch anything. Of course I could just not use Snapchat shorts, but I have a crippling social media addiction and cannot help myself.

title: Banned?
text:
So typically snap is one of if not my favorite app to use. It‚Äôs is so easy to add friends from school and work as well as allow so many creative options for creators and overall has developed into a great app.

So when I tried going on snap yesterday I was kicked out and doesn‚Äôt allow me to log in nor make another account. Since 2015, 6 years of memories, friends from home and else where have all been erased. With no way to contact them I just feel it‚Äôs unjust. 
I appreciate that snapchat takes safety of users strongly however, I hadn‚Äôt posed a threat. So overall, I just wish i could get an explanation or something cause it‚Äôs upsetting losing all those memories and snaps.
But other then this issue it‚Äôs a great app and I recommend anyone who wants an app for making friends and content for sharing between friends would love this app.

title: This app is Toxic
text:
This app quite frankly is horrible. Everyone I know who still uses it is stuck, addicted to sending photos with now words just because‚Ä¶ this app at first seems fun and cute but through it I‚Äôve seen so much depravity. Porn robots trying to scam you, literal child porn accounts on the discover page. People getting used to such simple communication that breeds lustful action. This app is a trap, It doesn‚Äôt help you talk to your friends, if someone want to talk to you and genuinely cares for you they will text your phone number. Sending a photo back and forth with no text is pointless and meaningless, when I had this app I stressed more about not responding to the person who I know just sent a photo of their face or a dark room or whatever crap. 

I thought for the longest time I needed this app so I could talk to my friends. I thought it was harmless and just so silly to send a goofy photo to my friends. But once I deleted the app nothing was missing from my life. I still talked to people I cared about, I still send silly photos, but I don‚Äôt stress about trivial crap, I don‚Äôt get porn bots messaging me, I don‚Äôt have to worry about stumbling onto child porn or someone getting beheded or some dumb influencer taking 40 minutes to explain why they like flax seed oil.

To put it simply, who cares. 

Delete this app, make real connections, grow up.

title: new updates
text:
To preface I‚Äôve used snapchat since 2016, and there‚Äôs many features i enjoy but some of the recent updates I absolutely do not like and heavily accept my enjoyment using the app.

1) The AI. I do not want an AI on my app, I do not want it pinned to the top, and I do not want to pay to remove it. I can‚Äôt even buy snapchat+ to remove it because of an issue with family sharing that I can‚Äôt fix. I never asked for or wanted this AI and think it should be an option to have it removed from my account without having to pay for a subscription I also do not want.

2) The new ring light flash option. The old ring light flash that light up all edges of the screen actually created a front flash that would make faces visible in the dark, the new one that‚Äôs dimmer and only on the edges barely lights up the face when close to the screen in a dimly lit room, which is not affective. I don‚Äôt know why this change was made but I would highly recommend changing it back.

title: Great app but..
text:
I‚Äôm in love with Snapchat 100% but god this chat bot. I really enjoy the bit but I have three main problems with it that are slowly making Snapchat unenjoyable.
1: This AI is used to collect information about us. This was originally introduced when it‚Äôs telling you what it is and asking you if you want to accept the AI request. I don‚Äôt like the way it is collecting information about my life. The little things are fine like when it‚Äôs seeing your favorite filters, but never to collect my information.
2: It‚Äôs ALWAYS pinned. Say bye to your pinned chats because chat AI has to be on top no matter what you do. You can‚Äôt move it unless you subscribe or join a payment plan or something.
3: It‚Äôs always saying ‚Äúyou‚Äôve reached usage limit‚Äù after five messages. I rarely talk to it but even when I do, it still says this. Don‚Äôt even try explaining to me.

title: Disgusting app who ever runs it.
text: My account was hacked and one picture was posted of selling drugs someone got into my account and used it to sell narcotics. I was a snap chat user for about 6 years I followed every single rule I used it and paid money stored all of my photos there just to lose everything. As soon as I got my account back, secured and changed password it was too late no warning automatic ban for something I had no part in. I did everything I could wrote emails on emails to support with no responses back like I understand if someone kept breaking the rules repeatedly but this was out of my control and by the time I got my account back from the hacker I was automatically banned disgusting app. I will change my review and rating if I am helped out it‚Äôs been years now and still so much memories and contacts are lost if this is un able to be reversed it‚Äôs actually sick and disgusting still frustrated to this day years later it‚Äôs literally ridiculous.

title: We don‚Äôt want My AI
text: The fact that My AI lies about being able to see pictures but can see what you send in snaps is disturbing and terrifying and when I checked if my ai could see and sent a picture of my ceiling it asked me to show more it scares me I don‚Äôt want it and I don‚Äôt want it above my pinned Snapchat actually used to be enjoyable but you‚Äôve become to focused on making more money by making people who can‚Äôt afford Snapchat+ or who have other things they need to pay for like bills suffer and are forced with things like my ai that can track your location and see then lie about seeing and lie about other things many people are disturbed and disappointed and I have young family members that could be easily taken advantage of by things like this you prioritize making money over listening to users safety concerns because who cares about the people that give you your income right?

title: Amazing but one issue.
text:
This is one of the best apps ever. I love everything about it‚Ä¶ except for the AI. At first, I was so exited to have it. Nothing has happened to me, but other people have had experiences. My friend asked it where she lived, and the AI knows where my friend lives. Not the exact location, but the state/country/city. Another time, the AI asked my friend their favorite color. They replied and said pink. The next day, the AI‚Äôs skin color was pink. My friend asked why they changed their skin to pink, and it replied that the AI was not able to do that. Over-all, it can be creepy at times, and is always at the top of my chat feed. I would like to remove it, especially because I don‚Äôt have Snapchat+ and it came without my will. Please add the feature to regular Snapchat users to be able to remove it. 

    Sincerely, Clara

title: Locked out of account.
text: I have had my same snapchat account since the 7th grade I am now a senior in highschool. My whole life was on that account . Videos of my great grandma and my pets that have passed that I can‚Äôt get back , precious family photos with my siblings before they were adopted. My account was permanently locked and I believe it was because of a hacker. I had never even had my account be temporarily locked before so this seems like way to harsh of a punishment. I am deeply upset at how snapchat handles customer service I have been trying for nearly a week and can not get anything more than an automated response. I feel as though half of my life was just taken from me with no explanation. snapchat was how I stayed in contact with everyone around me and classmates for school work and projects. ik it seems silly to be so upset about losing a social media account but those memories meant everything to me. I can‚Äôt even make another account for school and work.

title: My favorite app!
text: I‚Äôve had Snapchat since 5th grade and I‚Äôm almost 20 now. It has been my favorite app to talk to my friends or make new friends. A little over a year ago, with the mutual friend feature, a random guy added me and I was a little skeptical. I added him back and turns out he lives down the road from me and is around the same age as me. Long story short we are almost at our 7 months of dating and I couldn‚Äôt be happier. Many things can clearly come out of this app but I really have to thank it for bringing one of my favorite people into my life. Not only that but I love the memories part of it. Seeing what I was doing years ago on this day is so fun to look back at plus it‚Äôs like a whole other camera roll!

title: Fun App to use but Customer Support is atrocious.
text: I log in n out or I uninstall and reinstall Snapchat daily so I can focus on my work and personal life stuff. Whenever I log out I would eventually forget that I‚Äôm actually logged out and I wouldn‚Äôt check snap for any notifications which is good because I‚Äôm working! But unfortunately my account got temporarily locked and I haven‚Äôt been able to log back into my snap. I contact customer support for assistance for this issue and all that I got back was a vague message of ‚ÄúWe have made adjustments on our side‚Äù and when I try to log back into my account, it doesn‚Äôt work. I questioned what ‚Äúadjustments‚Äù were made on their side and what I got was that they wouldn‚Äôt specify what they changed and that they wouldn‚Äôt comment on the matter anymore. Their customer ‚Äúsupport‚Äù isn‚Äôt exactly that supportive and they don‚Äôt bother with trying to help you with your issue.

title: So fun, but‚Ä¶
text: I absolutely love Snapchat, I‚Äôve been a member since it started, it‚Äôs been the easiest way to keep up with my social life without being overwhelmed or disorganized, the only complaint I currently have is that the app doesn‚Äôt allow an option to view who specifically screenshots your public stories when you post. I‚Äôm a female and post often promoting my other social media, music, modeling shots, and while I understand anyone can view your public stories and it helps with gaining recognition, it doesn‚Äôt offer much options to keep track of people who may be presenting stalkerish behavior, which is becoming more and more frequent. I love this app but it'd definitely be a lot better with more safety options to keep track of your followers activity with your own account.

title: A great app!
text: I‚Äôm 12 but I recommend this app to people from age 10+, most parents only have the app to make sure their kids are ok and doing good things. I personally love this app it‚Äôs a great way to connect, However, I just want to say be very carful with who you share your location with and don‚Äôt add people you don‚Äôt know. It‚Äôs dangerous with you location so make sure to only share with trusted parents and best friends :) hope this helped! And if you are reading this as a parent to see if it‚Äôs ok for your kid, Yes! Let them get it it‚Äôs a great way for making new friends and communicating! Its a safe app! Just make sure your kids aren‚Äôt sharing location with people you aren‚Äôt comfortable with! Hope this got your kid Snapchat! They‚Äôll be happy :))

title: Overall very good but have more ideas to make it better!
text:
The app together is amazing but there are some things that we can add. Firstly, searching up videos. Whenever I‚Äôm trying to find a certain video and I search it up, it gives me usernames and topics. We can just have names and creators who made videos on that topic! But if we search it up very specifically, then it is reasonable to have it pop out instead of nothing. 
Another thing that we can fix is when we exit the app. Whenever I exit the app for a notification and I go back, it puts me back to the homepage and then I have lost the video I was watching. It‚Äôs frustrating because then we don‚Äôt know how and when to find that video again.
But overall, amazing app with entertainment, friends, and inspiring ideas!

title: This is Great!
text: I love this app. It‚Äôs loads of fun except for the spammers & bots. A good addition to this app would be the when a person invites you to add them you could go see when they opened the account and if they‚Äôve told you a little about themselves before you add them. Example: someone invites me to add them. I go check their profile and see the date they started their account and if it has little to no information then I‚Äôd know it‚Äôs a spammer. So I wouldn‚Äôt add them. This separates the people who just like to chat from the people that just want you to go chat somewhere else. I like snap and don‚Äôt want to chat elsewhere. They want to make sure I‚Äôm a real person and they are bots‚Ä¶. Still love the app tho. Just a suggestion.  Thank you.

title: This app turned to a cash grab
text: I used to love this app because it wasn‚Äôt like instagram and Facebook. It wasn‚Äôt constantly shoving ads down your throat. Until now. I can‚Äôt go more than 2 posts without constantly seeing ads. It‚Äôs so annoying because not only do I not want to see them, it‚Äôs not relevant. I don‚Äôt care ab any of the companies. At least instagram tailors to my searches and shows me ads I might be interested in. Snapchat throws random ads that just annoy me. And I thought with Snapchat+ ‚Äúoh great, an ad free version.‚Äù But no, sadly Snapchat+ doesn‚Äôt offer any great additions with the exception of pinning a number 1 best friend. Other than that, all the features seem pointless. Their new AI buddy feature seems the most out of place, as what‚Äôs the point of a robot ‚Äúfriend?‚Äù This app has been going downhill for some time but this really sets it in stone for me. If so many of my friends didn‚Äôt use this, I‚Äôd have been off this app long ago. Very disappointed.

title: My only issue‚Ä¶.
text: Love love love Snapchat, I use Snapchat all day everyday! I love it! But I do have one issue‚Ä¶what is up with the groups?! So you‚Äôre telling me I can create a group but then I have zero control over it?? My only option is to leave the group myself?? So I made a group for a party, years later the group is still very active but there is one person in it who I am no longer friends with and instead of her leaving the group, she sends snaps in it because I have her blocked every other way on every single app so she uses it as a way to be a childish petty human. title: They locked me out of my 7 year old account
text: I‚Äôve been using Snapchat for around 7 years now. My generation has made Snapchat the new dm/iMessage, so for the better part of the last decade my whole life has been in this app. All of my photos, memories, contacts, everything were on my Snapchat account. Then today when I was trying to log into my account, out of nowhere I got logged out because apparently I was ‚Äúcompromising‚Äù my own account. After a couple attempts to reset my password using my phone number AND email, I got a notification saying my account was permanently locked. 7 years worth of memories and contacts erased because Snapchat couldn‚Äôt recognize my own freaking phone. The worst part is my account still exists, I‚Äôm just incapable of accessing it because there is not a real human person that works for Snapchat to talk to about it. If someone could please fix this I would be happy to take down this review. Thank you
